name: Stack the odds: Battle against the clock!!
name_original: Stack the odds: Battle against the clock!!
description:
You have to act fast! Stuck in a looping fight against a time god, only by figuring out what your skills do and mastering them will you be able to defeat your opponent.

Made in 10 days for the 8 Bits to Infinity Time Jam.

Assets used:

  • https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font
  • https://freesound.org/people/colorsCrimsonTears/sounds/580307/
  • https://freesound.org/people/colorsCrimsonTears/sounds/563541/
  • https://freesound.org/people/colorsCrimsonTears/sounds/577961/
  • https://gist.github.com/spireggs/2b8221a2961f2352542fad8f9a9dc07e
